FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about our scaly marketplace
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What types of lizards can I find on your marketplace?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our marketplace offers a wide variety of lizards, including geckos, iguanas, chameleons, bearded dragons, and many more exotic species. We constantly update our inventory to provide the best selection for lizard enthusiasts.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: How do I ensure the lizard I purchase is healthy?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: All lizards on our marketplace come from reputable breeders and undergo a thorough health check before listing. We provide detailed health information and care history for each lizard. Additionally, we offer a health guarantee to ensure your satisfaction.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: What should I prepare before buying a lizard?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Before purchasing a lizard, ensure you have an appropriate habitat set up, including the correct size terrarium, heating and lighting equipment, substrate, and decorations. Research the specific needs of the lizard species you're interested in and prepare accordingly.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: How does shipping work for live lizards?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: We use specialized, insulated packaging and partner with experienced reptile shipping services to ensure safe delivery. Lizards are typically shipped overnight or via priority methods, depending on the destination. We carefully monitor weather conditions to avoid shipping during extreme temperatures.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Do you offer support after I receive my lizard?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Absolutely! We provide ongoing support to all our customers. Our team of reptile experts is available to answer questions about care, feeding, and habitat maintenance. We also offer resources and guides on our website to help you provide the best care for your new scaly friend.
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Lizard Marketplace
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What types of lizards are available on your marketplace?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our marketplace offers a wide variety of lizards, including geckos, iguanas, chameleons, and bearded dragons. We work with reputable breeders to ensure a diverse selection of species and morphs.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: How do I ensure the lizard I purchase is healthy?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: All lizards on our marketplace come with health guarantees and are thoroughly checked by veterinarians before listing. We also provide detailed care information and support to ensure your new pet thrives in its new home.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: What's included with my lizard purchase?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Each lizard comes with a starter care kit, including feeding guidelines, habitat recommendations, and a health certificate. We also offer optional add-ons such as terrariums, heating equipment, and food supplies.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: How does shipping work for live lizards?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: We use specialized, insulated packaging and express shipping methods to ensure the safe and comfortable transport of your lizard. All shipments are tracked and insured, and we coordinate delivery times to minimize stress on the animal.
